description: Explore the vast Safe Ecosystem, empowering over 200 onchain projects. From innovative DAO tooling to dynamic DeFi solutions, discover how Safe drives web3 forward.

title: Explore the Safe Ecosystem
text: Projects leveraging the power of Safe Smart Accounts

title: Integrate with Safe
text: Learn how you can be a part of the Safe ecosystem by building on top of the Safe{Core} stack.

items.title: Connect as a Safe App
items.text: Integrate your standalone DApp as a Safe App by leveraging our safe-apps-sdk, and get it added to our Safe App store within Safe{Wallet}

items.title: Build on Safe
items.text: Create your own use case and UI/UX, powered by the security of the Safe contracts, using the Protocol Kit and the {Core}SDK

items.title: Extend Safe Functionality
items.text: Add new features to the Safe protocol by building a module, or further secure your transactions by creating a guard
